title: Tomato Soup & Grilled Cheese
description: Creamy roasted tomato soup paired with a buttery, crisp grilled cheese sandwich. Bright tomato acidity, a touch of sweetness and herbs balanced by melted cheddar on golden sourdough provide classic comfort-food flavors.

ingredients.display_name: ripe plum or Roma tomatoes, halved
ingredients.notes: use medium tomatoes; can mix cherry tomatoes (halve)
or chicken broth if not vegetarian
for richness; reduce or omit for lighter soup
reserve a few leaves for garnish

ingredients.display_name: unsalted butter (for grilled cheese and skillet)
ingredients.notes: 3 tbsp for sandwiches total and 3 tbsp for soup cooking

ingredients.display_name: sharp cheddar cheese, sliced or grated

steps.text: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss halved tomatoes, half the olive oil, 1 tsp salt and a pinch of pepper on a rimmed baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast tomatoes in the preheated oven until softened and slightly caramelized at edges, stirring once halfway through to ensure even roasting.
While tomatoes roast, heat 1 tbsp butter and remaining olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add chopped onion and cook until translucent and softened, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic to the onion and cook until fragrant (about 30 seconds to 1 minute) without browning.
Add roasted tomatoes (including any juices from the pan) and vegetable broth to the saucepan. Stir in sugar and remaining salt and pepper, bring to a gentle simmer.
Simmer the soup gently for a few minutes to marry flavors, then remove from heat and blend until smooth using an immersion blender or in batches in a countertop blender. Return to pot.
Stir in heavy cream and chopped basil, warm gently over low heat and adjust seasoning. Keep soup on low while preparing sandwiches.

Butter one side of each bread slice. Heat a large skillet over medium-low heat. Assemble sandwiches with buttered side out and cheese inside, then cook sandwiches in skillet until bread is golden and cheese is melted, flipping once. Use moderate heat to avoid burning and press slightly with a spatula.
Serve soup hot, ladle into bowls, garnish with basil and optional parmesan. Cut grilled cheese sandwiches in half and serve alongside for dipping.
